scripts.examples: cd examples/copy-level && enb make pseudo && cd ../filter-level && enb make pseudo && cd ../merge-level && enb make pseudo
scripts.clean: rm -rf examples/copy-level/nested-pseudo-level.blocks && rm -rf examples/copy-level/.enb/tmp && rm -rf examples/filter-level/nested-pseudo-level.blocks && rm -rf examples/filter-level/.enb/tmp && rm -rf examples/merge-level/pseudo-level.blocks && rm -rf examples/merge-level/.enb/tmp
